body:
I solved it myself. It turned out I was repeating NSTimer without invalidating when dismissing the top UIViewController.

I solved it by, first, assigning the timer to a property

 _timer = [NSTimer scheduledTimerWithTimeInterval:0.2 target:self selector:@selector(dismissWriter) userInfo:nil repeats:YES];

and then, in viewWillDisappear

[_timer invalidate];
_timer = nil;

Now, the UITableViewController underneath works with Reachability. Hope my mistake might help someone.
title: Reachability stops working
